import collections
def solve(s1,s2):
    if collections.Counter(s1) == collections.Counter(s2):
        return 'YES'
    return 'NO'

    
def tech04():
    T = int(raw_input())
    for t in xrange(T):
        s1, s2 = raw_input().split()
        print solve(s1,s2)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    tech04()
